Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox itself has width 16px, height 16px, 1px solid border #6c757d, background color #ffffff, is initially unchecked (value false), is enabled, and is positioned at x 15px and y 200px
Verify the 'Language Selector' dropdown displays 'English' as its current text, has 1px solid border #cccccc, and aria-label 'Select Language'
Confirm the dropdown options are initially hidden
Verify the dropdown options become visible on click
Check there are 3 options available, each with width 150px, padding 8px, and font size 14px
Verify each dropdown option's background color changes to #e9ecef on hover

Check the 'Item Added to Cart' notification banner is visible for 3 seconds, then transitions to hidden with an opacity fade out over 500ms, has background color #d4edda, text color #155724, padding 15px 20px, margin top 10px, border radius 4px, width 350px, and displays the exact text 'Item Added to Cart successfully!'
Verify the hero image has source 'hero_homepage.jpg', rendered dimensions 1200x400px, loaded within 800ms, and no watermark
Verify the main title 'Welcome to Our Store' is displayed over the image, positioned at top 100px, with font size 48px, color #ffffff, font weight 700, and text alignment 'center'

Confirm the 'Privacy Policy' link in the footer has text 'Privacy Policy', color #6c757d, font size 13px, font family 'Arial', padding 5px, left position 15px, bottom position 10px, and text alignment 'left'
Check there are a total count of 4 links in the footer, each with width 100px
Check the active carousel indicator dot has shape 'circle', width 10px, height 10px, opacity 1, background color #007bff, 1px solid border #007bff, is active/selected, and has margin right 5px
Verify there are a total count of 5 indicator dots, aligned 'center' horizontally
Verify the 'Next' pagination button is enabled, displays text 'Next', has font size 14px, background color #007bff, border radius 4px, padding 8px 12px, height 36px, and width 60px
Check that the entire pagination component is aligned 'center' and has bottom margin 20px
Check the tooltip for the 'Info' icon is hidden initially

Verify the tooltip becomes visible on hover, displays text 'Additional information here', has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, padding 5px 10px, border radius 3px, width 180px, height 30px, and its x position is 100 and y position is 50 relative to the icon

Confirm the user profile avatar has source 'avatar_user.png', rendered dimensions 60x60px, loads within 200ms, has opacity 1, border radius 50% (circular shape), 2px solid border #007bff, alt text 'User Profile Picture', and is positioned at x 20 and y 20

Verify the search input field displays 'Search products...' as its placeholder text, has width 250px, height 36px, background color #ffffff, 1px solid border #ced4da, border radius 4px, and font size 14px
When the search input field is focused, verify its border color changes to #80bdff
Enter 'laptop' into the search input field
Verify the search input field's value is 'laptop'
Verify the search results count is 12

Check the sidebar content area has width 250px, height 600px, background color #f8f9fa, opacity 1, padding 20px, right position 0px from the viewport, top 0px, 1px solid border #e9ecef, and scroll behavior has a transition of 300ms
After scrolling down, verify the sidebar content area's scroll-top value is 300px
Verify the 5-star rating component displays a total count of 5 stars, with padding 5px, positioned at x 10, y 10, aligned 'left', and has aria-label '3 out of 5 stars'
Each star has width 20px, height 20px, and margin right 2px
Confirm 3 stars are filled with color #ffc107
Confirm the remaining 2 stars are unfilled with color #e9ecef
